full_summary:
### Development of Collaborative Areas at the Canadian Space Agency

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01006572
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F030-22-0117
* **Publication Date**: September 8, 2022
* **Closing Date**: October 14, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: October 10, 2022

#### Description of the Project

The Canadian Space Agency is seeking the services of a general contractor, qualified to practice and holding a Quebec permit, to develop two new collaborative areas at the John H. Chapman Centre. The contractor must have experience in Interior Fit-Up/Renovations and Interior Design Services, including Functional Programming.

#### Site Visit

A site visit has been scheduled for September 21, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. at the Canadian Space Agency head office located at 6767 Route de l'Aeroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec J3Y 8Y9. Bidders are required to notify the Contracting Authority no later than September 19, 2022 to confirm their attendance and provide the names of the individuals who will attend.

#### Procurement Method

This tender is open to all qualified contractors. Proposals will be evaluated based on the qualifications and experience of the bidder.

#### Contracting Entity

The Canadian Space Agency is the contracting entity for this tender. The agency is headquartered in Quebec, Canada.

#### Contact Information

For additional information, please contact Melanie Seguin at melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca or 438 364-1399.

#### Attachments

The following documents are available for download: 

* 2020-134-1020-1001-specs-arc-pour_soumission.pdf
* 2020-134-1020-1000-add-ele-001-pln

* 2020-134-1020-1001-add-mec-001-fr

These attachments can be found at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents.
